course_description: Learn the basics of programming with this introductory course.It will give you beasic understanding of programming language and how it intereact with hardware.We will explore a framework of c language.
Explore the fundamental principles of algorithm design and analysis. Learn to solve computational problems efficiently, covering algorithmic paradigms, data structures, and algorithmic thinking
Learn the C++ programming language and its application in Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA).Develop coding skills for problem-solving, data manipulation, and algorithm implementation using C++.

This course provides a fundamental understanding of data structures, a crucial concept in computer science and programming. Data structures are essential for efficiently organizing and manipulating data in software development.

This course serves as an introduction to the fundamental concepts of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP), a powerful paradigm for software design and development. Students will learn the principles of OOP, including classes, objects, inheritance, encapsulation, and polymorphism.
This comprehensive course in Software Engineering equips students with the knowledge and skills needed to develop high-quality software systems.

This course provides a comprehensive introduction to Amazon Web Services (AWS) and the fundamentals of cloud computing. Students will learn to harness the power of AWS services for building scalable, reliable, and cost-effective cloud solutions.
Delve into the world of relational databases with a focus on MySQL. This course provides a solid foundation in database management, covering data modeling, querying, and administration using MySQL.
This course is designed to enhance your problem-solving skills and equip you with effective strategies to tackle a wide range of challenges.
